subject: re:Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to find all the drugs you shop for in your USA pharmacy. The only difference is that our drugs are 100% generic and are sold at a much lower price. CanadianPharmacy save together with our discount Canadian Web pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy your #1 source for cheap generic drugs from Canada.
Yours faithfully,Nicolas Kirby
